A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow. I have never felt so ill leaving a movie theater. 12 hours later\, I'm still at a loss for words other than to say TLJ is a disaster in every conceivable way. apart from the irreparable damage it has done to the SW story\, it is just a very poorly written movie. Lots of flashy sci-fi effects may soothe some people\, but if you enjoy SW for the STORY\, this is not the film you are looking for.
